snippet.title: Spicy Fruit - Official Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2814660/Spicy_Fruit/

Spicy Fruit is a physics-based puzzle game! Drop cute fruit! Combine matching fruit to evolve to the next fruit! Feed them chili peppers to set them ablaze for more points! When you combine 2 chili peppers, things get even crazier! But, be careful not to overfill the container!
